title: 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath,Orange Grove,historic Tournament of Roses Area
app_fee: $40 application fee, includes a credit check.
posting_body: Beautiful 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath on South Orange Grove in historic Tournament of Roses area!
227 S. Orange Grove Blvd | Pasadena, CA 91105
This is a spacious two-bedroom apartment in Pasadena's historic and coveted Tournament House area of Orange Grove Boulevard.
We recently remodeled the kitchen and dining, and installed new floors.
Two bedrooms, two baths, a large living room.
The master bedroom opens onto the private patio.
This apartment is on the 2nd floor.
Unit comes with Dishwasher, Stove, Oven, Washer and Dryer (as is), gas burning fireplace.
Tenants pay for gas and electric.
Building pays for water and trash.
This apartment is part of a five-unit building in immaculate condition on the west side of Orange Grove, between Green Street and Del Mar (map), with a front-row view of the annual Rose Parade.
All units include central air and heat, access to on-site laundry and two assigned parking spaces.

You are across the street from a tree-lined park, close proximity to Old Town Pasadena, the Rose Bowl, The Norton Simon Museum and the Arroyo Seco for your recreational enjoyment, and 1.5 miles from Trader Joe's and Whole Foods.
Just a few blocks up Orange Grove to access to the 210 and 134 freeways, or 1.5 miles down the street to get on the 110 to Downtown LA.
